geofi - Finland GIS R tools

R tools for spatial data in Finland.

Installation and use

For installation and usage, check the tutorial page.

Contribute

Contributions are very welcome:

  • Use issue tracker for feedback and bug reports.
  • Send pull requests
  • Star us on the Github page
  • Join the discussion in Gitter

Acknowledgements

Kindly cite this work as follows: Markus Kainu, Joona Lehtomäki, Juuso Parkkinen, Jani Miettinen, Leo Lahti Retrieval and analysis of open geospatial data from Finland with the geofi R package. R package version 0.9.2900006. URL: http://ropengov.github.io/geofi

We are grateful to all contributors, including Juusi Parkkinen, Jussi Jousimo, Janne Aukia, Aaro Salosensaari and Jani Miettinen. This project is part of rOpenGov.
